page.title: 03FARMING IN CHELFORD cont.
page.content: Gatley Green farm has 90 dairy cattle, 90 young stock and 1 bull. Holly Tree farm has 110 dairy cattle and grows barley and carrots. Fir-tree farm has 63 dairy cows, 1 bull and 23 bullocks. They have 13 acres of barley and the rest is grass. It is all used to feed their animals. Kell Green Farm grows corn, grass and potatoes. Peck Mill Farm keeps 40 beef cattle, 7 sheep and 12 lambs and grows grass for the animals. Walton Farm has 55 dairy cows and a bull. It is also a stud farm and has 15 horses and one donkey. Sandlebridge farm has 135 dairy cows, 130 pigs, 4000 poultry and 45 sheep and lambs. They grow grass and barley for the animals and also a variety of vegetables.
